frameDefinitions: An Experiencer feels bad about a choice, an Action, or a failure to do something, which they now consider to have been a mistake or wrong.
An Item is located on a Scale relative to a critical value which is determined by some Enabled_situation.
A Figure is (stably) located with respect to a Ground in terms of how the distance between them compares to some general or contextually relevant scale.
A member or members of a Class have just been  mentioned or are present in the discourse setting and now a different instance  (or group of instances) of the same class is referred to.
A Resisting_entity is capable of resisting or does resist a physical Opposing_force to a level specified by the target.
This frame contains transparent nouns (and some adjectives) denoting quantities of a Mass or of Individuals.
frameExamples: Smithers did not <t>repent</t> of his crime.
My husband left me for <t>another</t> woman -- and now wants to get back together again!
The great and <t>impregnable</t> fortress still stands today.
He found them in the <t>deluge</t> of papers on his desk.
listRoleDefinitions: The role <fen>Experiencer</fen> indicates the person who experiences the emotion about their prior action.
The role <fen>Action</fen> marks expressions that indicate a prior action that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> has come to feel bad about.
The role <fen>Expressor</fen> marks expressions that indicate a gesture or body part which is displaying the <fen>Emotional_state</fen> of the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.
The role <fen>Emotional_state</fen> is modified by an adjective  that indicates the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is contrite.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> or the <fen>Expressor</fen> is contrite.
The entity whose scalar property is specified.
The <fen>Scale</fen> is the attribute of the <fen>Item</fen> that is being described.
This role identifies the <fen>Enabled_situation</fen> by which the critical value is judged.
The <fen>Ground</fen> serves as a basis for describing the location of the <fen>Figure</fen>.
The <fen>Figure</fen> is perceived as located relative to a certain <fen>Ground</fen> location. The figure can be an entity or an event.
The <fen>Figures</fen> are items which mutually serve to identify the location of the other items.
The period of time during which the locative relation between <fen>Figure</fen> and <fen>Ground</fen> obtains.
The general category of entity which has been referred to.
The instance of the <fen>Class</fen> that is added to the <fen>Initial_set</fen> of entities in the <fen>Class</fen>.
The previously mentioned group of entities of the <fen>Class</fen>.
The <fen>Resisting_entity</fen> is the item that resists the <fen>Opposing_force</fen> to the level specified by the target.

The <fen>Opposing_force</fen> is the item placed in opposition to the <fen>Resisting_entity</fen>. <fen>Opposing_force</fen> hinders, blocks, helps, or allows (lets) the <fen>Resisting_entity</fen> to resist at the level specified by the target. Sometimes this Core role is incorporated in the target; otherwise, it is often null instantiated in example sentences.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Resisting_entity</fen> resists an external force.
The location where the <fen>Resisting_entity</fen> resists an external force.
The <fen>Quantity</fen>-denoting <t>Target</t> word.
A substance that is being quantified.
A collection of entities.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Smithers</fex> was contrite about his wrongdoings.
They confessed and repented <fex>their actions against the Soviet Union</fex>.
Repentant <fex>tears</fex> welled to his eyes.
Martha had a guilty <fex>conscience</fex> after selling inferior merchandise.
<fex>The light</fex> is probably bright enough.
It was <fex>hot</fex> enough to ignite the iron.
Can He make a rock too heavy <fex>for Him to lift</fex>?
The cat is near <fex>the mat</fex>.
<fex>The cat</fex> is near the mat.
<fex>The two waffle houses</fex> are so close together they can throw ingredients across the road to each other .
He was near Athens <fex>on Friday</fex>.
My Husband left me for another <fex>man</fex>!
There was <fex><t>another</t> power outage</fex> today.
A further five incursions <fex>over and above those noted for 1995</fex> took place in the first three months of 1996.
These are made from a tough <fex>plastic foam</fex> and are very light to wear.
The fortress was impregnable <fex>to attack by hostile invaders</fex>.
The retaining wall was even weaker <fex>yesterday</fex>, and had begun to crumble.
They decided the tree-house would be sturdiest <fex>in the big old backyard oak</fex>.
I had a <fex>heap</fex> of troubles.
A modicum <fex>of seepage on the floor</fex> is to be expected.
A number <fex>of concerned citizens</fex> have raised objections.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Conventions on the Rights of the Child
